selected_quotes: An #SLPeep challenges the use of forced seclusion and restraint in schools.
One #SLPeep challenges the use of forced seclusion and restraint in schools.
Speak up for students and end the use of forced seclusion and restraint in schools #trauma #violence #education

author.name: Carol Fenton
author.description: I've moved around & worn a few hats - babysitter, burger flipper, sales clerk, instructional aide & 20+ years in high-tech. Learned 1 thing. Follow the money!
